long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create "Lorem Ipsum" text for use in your web or print projects. Choose from multiple Ipsum generators, including the classic "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet...". Simple interface - pulls its content from Flipsum-Ipsum API on the Power Plugins site.
